tickets.description:
Hi Kevin,


Bob Profeta is having a technical glitch with his Office 365 email.  Can you please help?  (We've already called the help desk a few times).  He is getting this error message: [cid:3b8ba405-8845-4f84-accb-2ea9db50a53e]


We've gone into the settings and opted out of the Junk Folder entirely, but everything is still ending up there.  Please contact me as soon as you can.


Melissa Garren,

Begin forwarded message:

From: Le Li <lli@petradeconstruction.com<mailto:lli@petradeconstruction.com>>
Date: May 10, 2018 at 8:58:07 PM PDT
To: <eameri@apr.com<mailto:eameri@apr.com>>
Subject: Li and Mia Search

GoodEvening,

I and my Daughter Mia are actively searching for her first house in your area She has been working for Sony since Nov 2016 and with my support we think it is time for her to purchase her first House. Financially I will be supporting her with a percentage of the purchase price can send you proof of gift funds and she can send you her pre approval as well. Hope you will be able to assist in her first house purchase, we are very excited to be doing this together.


Best
Le li

"Live Love Laugh"

Hi,

I received the email below and it seems very much like some kind of a scam email, although it's not asking for any money.  I did a search for Petrade Construction and did not find anything -- typing in the url just redirects to Petra Construction.  Has anyone else received this or a similar email?


Regards,

Harry
